Services

Services We are offering.

Massage Therapy

Our professional masseuse bring you professional services, to ease the work pressure, and relax whole body.

Hot Stone

Hot stone massage therapy is a great way to reduce tension and stress while increasing circulation and metabolism.

Swedish Massage

This treatment offers greater relaxation and is exceptionally beneficial for increasing the level oxygen in the blood and body, decreasing muscle toxins, improving circulation and flexibility, and easing tension in your muscles and joints..

Therapy Type Massage

The procedure cures all kinds of pain caused by various injuries or illnesses.

Women Health

Chinese herbal medicines are extremely helpful in treating and helping manage women's health related problems.

Cupping

A therapy in which heated glass cups are applied to the skin along the meridians of the body, creating suction as a way of stimulating the flow of energy.

About

The path we grew up.

  • 2012

    Our Humble Beginnings

    In 2012, We opened our first Spa at downtown Milpitas, new Milpitas Library!

  • June 2015

    Remodeling

    To provide more spacious spaces and comfortable enviorment to our customers, we started to remodling!

  • Aug 2015

    Grand Reopening

    After two month remodeling, we are glad to reopen our new spa in 154 S Main St, Milpitas, CA!
